content: super simple top down raglan shaping sweater so your favorite skeleton friend doesn t get cold in the winter this pattern was written for a standard 19-20 inch skeleton i purchased mine from oriental trading company but they can be found most anywhere around halloween questions comments concerns feel free to email me at seaturtlegrrl@gmail com if you love this pattern and would like to support my work please feel free to drop me a ko-fi https //ko-fi com/witchinknittinmama all ko-fi donations will go towards giveaway prizes or back to the fiber community in some way and will not be kept for profit
